abstract: The Walt Disney Company signed the president of ABC Entertainment, Stephen McPherson, to a new contract, signaling confidence in the maverick executive’s ability to deliver new hits.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company signed the president of ABC Entertainment, Stephen McPherson, to a new contract, signaling confidence in the maverick executive’s ability to deliver new hits.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The Walt Disney Company signed the president of ABC Entertainment, Stephen McPherson, to a new contract, signaling confidence in the maverick executive’s ability to deliver new hits to succeed workhorses like “Grey’s Anatomy.”

headline.main: Months of Talks End in New Contract for ABC’s President
headline.print_headline: Months of Talks End in New Contract for ABC’s President

abstract: “The Walt Disney Company signed the president of ABC, Stephen McPherson, to a new contract, signaling confidence in the maverick executive’s ability to deliver new hits to succeed workhorses like ‘Grey’s Anatomy,'” Brooks Barnes reports.
lead_paragraph: “The Walt Disney Company signed the president of ABC, Stephen McPherson, to a new contract, signaling confidence in the maverick executive’s ability to deliver new hits to succeed workhorses like ‘Grey’s Anatomy,'” Brooks Barnes reports.
